step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Excellent! Open your palm and fingers wide.
Great job! Make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Well done! Open your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Visualize the fluid moving.
Good job maintaining the position. Keep your arm straight overhead.
Excellent! Continue to open your hand and fingers wide.
Great! Make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Fantastic! Open your hand while exhaling and relaxing. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Overhead Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Squeeze your fist tightly while inhaling, then relax your hand while exhaling. Keep up the good work!
